QuestData.Title: Into Twilight
QuestData.Description: The safety of my people is of the utmost priority.$B$BIt is likely that Ner'zhul has taken the prisoners to Shaz'gul, his stronghold to the southwest.$B$BI do not wish to use aggression against him, but he may force my hand.$B$BMeet me at Twilight Glade, $n. Then, we shall try our best to recover the prisoners.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Prophet Velen at Twilight Glade.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for coming, $n. There is much to be done.
